author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: قَدْ أَخَذَتِ الأَحْزَانُ مَطْلَعَ إِسْمِكَ الرَّحْمَنِ أَيْنَ سُرُوْرُ مَظْهَرِ ظُهُوْرِكَ يَا فَرَحَ العَالَمِيْنَ *
translation: Sorrows have afflicted the Revealer of Thy Name, the All-Merciful: Where is the joy of the Dayspring of Thy Revelation, O Delight of the worlds?
